description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Major Features

* Marking Items in-place within a PST
* EWS: Provision of synching folder own name

All Changes

Features

EMAILNET-34970 - Marking Items in-place within a PST
EMAILNET-38414 - EWS: Provision of synching folder own name etc 

Enhancements

EMAILNET-38448 - Provision to identify embedded (nested) messages in TNEF messages
EMAILNET-35239 - Implement RTF Extension Algorithm to properly display body of message after converting from eml to msg
EMAILNET-38446 - Convert inline attachments from RTF body to inline images in HTML body at MSG to EML conversion
EMAILNET-38443 - Improve log methods to decrease delay which depends on log operations 

Bugs

EMAILNET-35187 - Empty message Id retrieved while using ImapClient.ListMessages()
EMAILNET-38426 - IMAP Idle command stops receiving events after some times
EMAILNET-38430 - Adding nested message to EML message in TNEF format (winmail.dat)
EMAILNET-38434 - Accepting Task sent by Aspose.Email crashes MS Outlook
EMAILNET-38437 - EML to MHTML: Empty output
EMAILNET-38438 - MSG->MSG inserts spaces between paragraphs
EMAILNET-38441 - RTF MSG to MHTML: Font styles are not retained
EMAILNET-38450 - Empty Message body when Saved email using Aspose.Email API is sent using MS Outlook
EMAILNET-38452 - Resaving MSG file using MapiMessage destroys Ole Object in MSG
EMAILNET-38439 - Loading Large EML raises System.OutOfMemory Exception in x86 settings
EMAILNET-38447 - EML to MHT raises Exception
EMAILNET-38449 - Exception while using IEWSClient.CreateContact with MapiContact and Contact
EMAILNET-38454 - Exception while loading EML to MailMessage
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
